remarks: Write the epsilon-delta definition of a limit.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2016.)
statement:
ellimc3.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
ellimc3.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
ellimc3.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
ellimc3 $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. ( F limCC B ) <-> ( C e. CC /\ A. x e. RR+ E. y e. RR+ A. z e. A ( ( z =/= B /\ ( abs ` ( z - B ) ) < y ) -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` z ) - C ) ) < x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
